product.descripcion:
Tenis de plataforma, calzado urbano y casual.
Características: Suela gruesa, cierre con cordones, material principal sintético (comúnmente).

results_by_angle.angle_name: Altura que estiliza sin tacón (plataforma discreta)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Mujer 18-34 urbana que busca verse más alta y estilizada sin usar tacones

aida_strategy.attention: Captivate with the modern urban sneaker look and unique textured platform.
aida_strategy.interest: Show the immediate impact of increased height without discomfort.
aida_strategy.desire: Portray the effortless style and physical benefit in everyday settings.
aida_strategy.action: Encourage immediate interaction with a sense of urgency to try the stylish transformation.

ad_copy.title: Eleva tu estilo sin tacones
ad_copy.primary_text: Descubre cómo los Tenis Barbara te dan altura y estilo con comodidad. Perfectos para el día a día sin comprometer elegancia.
ad_copy.description: La solución ideal para verte más alta y estilizada. No pierdas la oportunidad de transformar tu look diario.

cards.goal: Capture attention with the vibrant look of the sneakers and pique interest showing the height increase.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Use ONLY the exact Tenis Barbara from the provided reference image. Do NOT generate a different model/variant. Prefer cutout/masking and compositing into a NEW scene.

nanobanana_prompt.prompt: Show a side view of a person wearing the Tenis Barbara sneakers standing on an urban sidewalk. Focus on the sneaker's sleek design and the unique platform height. Use vibrant lighting to highlight the texture and colors, ensuring the sneakers are the sharpest element. Incorporate a warm cityscape in the background, featuring a slightly blurred effect to draw attention to the product.

composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Product should not cover text zone

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: wrong product model, logos, watermarks, faces, extra text beyond overlays

cards.goal: Stimulate desire by showing style benefits and simplify the purchase decision process with direct CTAs.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Use ONLY the exact Tenis Barbara from the provided reference image. Do NOT generate a different model/variant. Prefer cutout/masking and compositing into a NEW scene.

nanobanana_prompt.prompt: Display a lifestyle scene with a person confidently walking through a chic urban area wearing the Tenis Barbara sneakers. Highlight the style and comfort of the footwear, focusing on the seamless integration of the platform into everyday outfits. Use natural lighting to evoke a sense of tranquility and offer a softly blurred background featuring urban elements.

text_overlays.text_exact: Estilo y comodidad todo el día
Compra ahora y transforma tu look

composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Product should not cover text zone

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: wrong product model, logos, watermarks, faces, extra text beyond overlays

compliance_notes: Ad copy maintains literal truth without unsupported claims.
Ensures product benefits are emphasized without exaggeration.
Guarantee terms are not misleading and accurately represented.

results_by_angle.angle_name: Comodidad todo el día (plantilla memory foam + suela gruesa)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Estudiante/office casual que camina mucho y prioriza confort sin perder estilo

aida_strategy.attention: Interrupción visual mostrando un tenis en un entorno urbano flotando, generando curiosidad.
aida_strategy.interest: Destacar la plantilla de memory foam con una visualización llamativa, enfatizando su suavidad.
aida_strategy.desire: Enfatizar el beneficio de comodidad todo el día mediante una imagen de alguien caminando con facilidad en un entorno urbano.
aida_strategy.action: Invitar a realizar la compra con un llamado directo a la acción como "Compra ahora y camina con estilo".

ad_copy.title: Descubre la comodidad de los Tenis Barbara
ad_copy.primary_text: Camina con estilo y comodidad todo el día gracias a la plantilla memory foam de los Tenis Barbara. No dejes que tus pies te detengan. ¡Haz tuyo tu par ahora mismo!
ad_copy.description: Comodidad y estilo se unen en los Tenis Barbara. Perfectos para quienes buscan lo último en calzado urbano y casual.

cards.goal: Captar la atención de personas que valoran el confort y mostrar el valor de la plantilla memory foam.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Use ONLY the exact Tenis Barbara from the provided reference image. Do NOT generate a different model/variant. Prefer cutout/masking and compositing into a NEW scene.

nanobanana_prompt.prompt: A dynamic urban scene with Tenis Barbara prominently floating in the center, creating a playful yet stylish atmosphere. The background includes a softly blurred urban street to emphasize focus on the shoe. Bright, natural lighting enhances the sharp details of the shoe, drawing attention to its design. Use bold sans-serif typography with strong shadows for the text overlay, positioned in the lower third with safe margins to ensure visibility. No faces or logos should be present. Keep the composition sleek and focused, maintaining a modern aesthetic.

composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: The product must not cover any text zone.

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: wrong product model, logos, watermarks, faces, extra text beyond overlays

cards.goal: Generar deseo y motivar al usuario a comprar los tenis mostrando el beneficio de caminar cómodamente.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Use ONLY the exact Tenis Barbara from the provided reference image. Do NOT generate a different model/variant. Prefer cutout/masking and compositing into a NEW scene.

nanobanana_prompt.prompt: A dynamic scene of an individual effortlessly walking through a vibrant urban landscape while wearing the Tenis Barbara. The focus is on the shoes, showing their use in a real-world context. The background is softly blurred with the city enhancing the perception of movement and daily life integration. Bright, airy lighting should capture the mood of comfort and ease. Use bold sans-serif typography for the overlay text, placed in the lower-third text-safe area. No faces or logos should be present. The composition should balance smoothly between storytelling and product showcase.

composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: The product must not cover any text zone.

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: wrong product model, logos, watermarks, faces, extra text beyond overlays

compliance_notes: Ensure the Tenis Barbara is accurately depicted as per the provided reference image.
Maintain consistent use of typography and placement for overlays across all cards.
Avoid any alterations to the product appearance that may mislead consumers.

results_by_angle.angle_name: Versatilidad de outfit (blanco que combina con todo)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Mujer que busca un par “comodín” para universidad, oficina casual y salidas

aida_strategy.attention: Utiliza un patrón de interrupción mostrando una combinación de outfits desde casual hasta formal.
aida_strategy.interest: Demuestra cómo un solo par de tenis puede complementar cada estilo de forma impecable.
aida_strategy.desire: Enfatiza los beneficios de poseer un calzado versátil que se adapta a múltiples ocasiones, suavizando la objeción de que "los blancos se ven básicos".
aida_strategy.action: Cierra con un llamado claro a la acción para comprar los tenis y disfrutar de su versatilidad y conveniencia.

ad_copy.title: Tenis que se adaptan a todo tu armario
ad_copy.primary_text: Desde la universidad hasta una salida nocturna, los Tenis Barbara son tu aliado perfecto para cualquier ocasión. ¡Combina con todo!
ad_copy.description: Descubre la versatilidad que estabas buscando con los Tenis Barbara.

cards.goal: Captar la atención mostrando la versatilidad de los tenis al combinar con múltiples estilos y capturar el interés demostrando sus múltiples usos.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Use ONLY the exact Tenis Barbara from the provided reference image. Do NOT generate a different model/variant. Prefer cutout/masking and compositing into a NEW scene.

nanobanana_prompt.prompt: A series of outfits arranged around a pair of white platform sneakers in sharp focus. The outfits include casual, business casual, and evening wear, each represented as floating around the central sneaker. Soft focus on background, creating a bokeh world where the viewer's eye is drawn to the sneaker as the centerpiece. Bright, even lighting across the composition. Titles placed near each outfit cluster, without covering the sneaker. Typography bold sans serif with stroke for depth and clear visibility.

composition_rules.focus: The sneakers are the sharpest element, centered among the outfit compositions.
composition_rules.hierarchy: Sneakers first, followed by the surrounding outfits.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: 10% edge margins all around the card
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: No product or critical visuals should place text within the text_safe_zone.

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: wrong product model, logos, watermarks, faces, extra text beyond overlays

cards.goal: Increase desire by picturing scenarios and close the deal with a clear call to action to purchase.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: CRITICAL: Use ONLY the exact Tenis Barbara from the provided reference image. Do NOT generate a different model/variant. Prefer cutout/masking and compositing into a NEW scene.

nanobanana_prompt.prompt: A scene with a pair of white platform sneakers in focus, placed next to a mini suitcase and a cute handbag, suggesting readiness to go out. Soft vacation-like background blur fading into the distance. Sneakers are sharp, positioned prominently. Bright, engaging lighting suggests a fresh start. The text overlay is within safe zones, ensuring clear communication. Typography is bold sans serif for effortless reading and impact.

composition_rules.focus: The sneakers prominently located, surrounded by travel-related items to inspire action.
composition_rules.hierarchy: Sneakers are first, followed by the travel purse and suitcase.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: 10% edge margins all around the card
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: No product or essential visuals should place text within the text_safe_zone.

nanobanana_prompt.negative_prompt: wrong product model, logos, watermarks, faces, extra text beyond overlays

compliance_notes: Ensure no unverified performance claims or bestseller status in conveying messages.
Adhere to accurate textual descriptions and promotions without stating invalid guarantees.
Refrain from including non-compliant visual elements such as brand logos or watermarks.
